components.name: echo
components.description: A simple agent that echoes input with an optional prefix.

components.name: random_joke
components.description: A tool that returns a random joke from a curated list.

components.name: web_search_agent
components.description: Unified web search agent supporting multiple providers (DuckDuckGo, Qwant) with configurable search strategies. Features privacy-focused and comprehensive search modes.

components.name: duckduckgo_search_tools
components.description: DuckDuckGo web search and URL content parsing tools with BeautifulSoup. Provides Mirascope pre-made tool integration and fallback implementations for privacy-respecting search.

components.name: qwant_search_tools
components.description: Privacy-focused web search tools using Qwant search engine. Provides an alternative to DuckDuckGo with support for multi-engine search.
